## Protocol.Tracing.TraceConfig.memoryDumpConfig property

Configuration for memory dump triggers. Used only when "memory-infra" category is enabled.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
memoryDumpConfig?: MemoryDumpConfig;
```
